messages.content: What are ostris_nodes_comfyui and how can I install them?
ostris_nodes_comfyui is a collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI that provide quality of life improvements. To install it, clone the repo into your ComfyUI's custom_nodes folder and restart the app.
What is the One Seed node and what are its outputs?
One Seed is a universal seed node that outputs in various formats such as SEED, int, number, float, STRING and ZFILL STRING.
What is LLM Prompt Upsampling and what does it do?
LLM Prompt Upsampling is a feature based on sayakpaul's caption-upsampling. It uses an LLM to expand your prompt into a more complex one. This is currently in beta and may remove TI embeddings.
What is the purpose of the LLM Pipe Loader node?
The LLM Pipe Loader node is used to load the LLM pipeline to use.
